attributes.action: Retain the 'COMMON LAW RIGHT' of MIS/MALFEASANCE in/of OFFICE as common law
attributes.additional_details:
"NO NEED TO LEGISLATE"

"The problems identified in the existing law clearly show that it would be undesirable either to retain the existing offence or to attempt to codify it in statute. All the options in the Consultation Paper therefore assume that the common law offence of misconduct in public office is to be abolished."

SILENCE IS TACIT CONSENT

http://www.lawcom.gov.uk/project/misconduct-in-public-office/?fbclid=IwAR3AhanqxVcx-w-4xnhmTvjgYej5p0azDWNHR2nZ5ANhFINOrMRu9_4KHoE
attributes.background:
Our right to hold to account those serving in public office is about to be ABOLISHED by Westminster. 
What gives any man or woman the right to place themselves above the law folks ? 
Yes ABOVE the law as the removal of YOUR RIGHTS ensures that is exactly what happens and throughout all realms
